Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-43796 affecting package python-tensorboard for versions less than 2.16.2-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-43796 affecting package python-tensorboard for versions less than 2.16.2-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-tensorboard is earlier than 2.16.2-5, affected by CVE-2024-43796
